content: **update 2021 ** i originally designed this free pattern for caron yarns in 2010 the pattern is difficult to find in their web archives and i receive many emails about where to find it resulting in me making it a free downloadable pdf that is easier to access original pattern can be found here designed by me and copyrighted by caron http //web archive org/web/20120220151629/http //www caron com/projects/dz/dz_gift_beanie html
